Calamares

A distribution independent installer framework

Home News Team

Development is underway!

Calamares is on track for a Q4 2014 release. Expect it on KaOS, Maui and Netrunner soon.

Join us on IRC: #calamares on chat.freenode.net.

Want to help with translations? Check out our Transifex project.

Written on March 3, 2014

Contact:

Mailing list: calamares-dev@googlegroups.com
IRC: #calamares on chat.freenode.net.
